name: Bright Ideas (thebrodester)
description:
Meet Lumina and Wattson

Nothing can come between this pair of love birds. Life without each other wouldn't go so well as they both need each other.

Lumina can make platforms of solid light and has a floaty jump. Wattson is heavy and can't jump high, but he keeps Lumina fully topped up with all the Watts she needs.

Follow these two in the 1-level prototype of 'Bright Ideas' a co-op puzzle platformer with a cute theme and an all acoustic soundtrack. The game was made in a total of 19 hours and all art, code and music was created in this 19 hour window.

Controls:

Player 1 (lumina)

  • A - left
  • D - Right
  • W - Jump
  • E - Make platform
  • Q - Interact

Player 2 (Wattson)

  • left arrow - left
  • right arrow - Right
  • up arrow - Jump
  • right CTRL - Interact
What to do

Explore the level to find the camera and outlet. Lumina can light up the cameras receptor and Wattson can put charge into the outlet.

When you reach the camera and electrical outlet press 'Interact' while standing near them to complete the level.
